scripts.postinstall: npm run compile && npm run convert
scripts.wiki_publish: npm run compile && ts-node ./bin/wiki all -o repo
scripts.icons_publish: npm run compile && ts-node ./bin/wiki files -o file
scripts.folders_publish: npm run compile && ts-node ./bin/wiki folders -o file
scripts.preview: npm run compile && ts-node ./bin/preview all -o file
scripts.kotlin: npm run compile && ts-node ./bin/kotlin all -o file
scripts.convert: npm run convert_icons && npm run convert_folders
